person.note: Wang(1) Yingchen [1759] Jinshi # 1. His son, Kui [3933], was promoted from Jiangxi tiju to Hubu langzhong in 1194. Chen Fuliang, WJ, 16.9b. XNYL, 198.10a, 16b, 21a; SHY:SH, 56.48a; SS, 387.3b-4a. CBD, 1, 727-8.
